description: Students consider, through intensive reading and discussion, a selected figure or movement from the history of philosophy. Prerequisite: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236, or permission of the department chair. Offered every two or three years.
name: St: German Idealism
prerequisites: Prerequisite: two courses in philosophy, one of which must be either 235 or 236, or permission of the department chair. Offered every two or three years.
title: Studies in the History of Philosophy
